H0.text: Melting point is the property of a substance that indicates whether the substance is a liquid or a solid at room temperature.

H1.text: Electrical conductivity is the property of a substance that indicates whether the substance is a liquid or a solid at room temperature.

H2.text: Flexibility is the property of a substance that indicates whether the substance is a liquid or a solid at room temperature.

H3.text: Solubility is the property of a substance that indicates whether the substance is a liquid or a solid at room temperature.

A4.text: The melting point of a substance is the temperature at which it changes state from solid to liquid.
